lead_paragraph: The ominous undertone of General Simovitch's broadcast last night to the Yugoslav people is clear witness to the gravity with which the Belgrade Government views the crisis with Germany. In his proclamation urging calm the Premier called upon his people to "give their lives," if destiny so ordered it, "for the good of their homes, their fatherland and King."
abstract: ed on Simovitch broadcast and Hitler dilemma
